name: detik_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool indonesia_news.
Tool description: We are focused on delivering data from major news websites in Indonesia.
API description: Search for news articles on detik.com using specified parameters.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.

limit.description: The number of results to return per page.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in news articles.
